original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, but not as the kings of Israel that were before him.
korean_text: 여호와께서 보시기에 악을 행하였으나 다만 그 전 이스라엘 여러 왕들과 같이 하지는 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord
but not as the kings of Israel
